target.rawSql:
SELECT ts_start, ts_end, word, name
FROM ${transcript_prefix}${table}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts_start)

targets.rawSql: SELECT MIN(ts) AS time_from, MAX(ts) AS time_to FROM $packets_prefix$table

panels.title: Click the button below to search and set the full timeline of $table

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts_start, ts_end, word
FROM ${transcript_prefix}${table}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts_start)

SELECT ts as time, audio_level 
FROM ${audio_prefix}${table}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts)

panels.title: Dialogo Alpacino audio db linear scale

panels.description: This panel visualize the power usage of the device

targets.rawSql:
SELECT load, ts as time,
FROM $power_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY ts ASC

panels.title: Power usage

panels.description: This panel visualizes the sum of bytes transmitted per sample rate over time, helping to analyze data flow trends effectively.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ip_src, ip_dst, ts as time, sum(frame_len) as ' ', tls_sni 
FROM $packets_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ '${ip_dst_type:regex}'
SAMPLE BY ${sample_rate} ALIGN TO CALENDAR
ORDER BY ts ASC

panels.title: Bytes Transferred per Sample Rate ($sample_rate) for each ip_dst, tls_sni

panels.description: A Heat map which shows the GeoIP of the connected IPs and the relative weight which is based on how many times an IP has been seen in the traffic capture.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  count(ip_dst_netify_geo_country) as pkts,
  ip_dst_netify_geo_continent as continent,
  ip_dst_netify_geo_country as country,
  ip_dst_netify_geo_city as city,
  ip_dst_netify_geo_lon AS longitude,
  ip_dst_netify_geo_lat as latitude
FROM $packets_prefix$table 
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC' AND
  ip_dst_netify_geo_lon != 0.0 AND
  ip_dst_netify_geo_lat != 0.0
GROUP BY 
  ip_dst_netify_geo_country,
  ip_dst_netify_geo_city,
  ip_dst_netify_geo_continent, 
  ip_dst_netify_geo_lon, 
  ip_dst_netify_geo_lat

panels.title: Netify IP GeoHeatMap Egress

panels.description: This panel visualizes the geographical distribution of outgoing IP addresses, highlighting the diversity in traffic sources for enhanced network analysis.
panels.title: Netify IPs Geo distribution Egress

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of TLS Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation (ALPN) identifiers in outbound traffic

targets.rawSql:
SELECT tls_alpn, count(*) as n
FROM $packets_prefix$table 
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
GROUP BY tls_alpn

panels.title: TLS ALPN Egress

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of TLS SNI (Server Name Indication) egress traffic

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  count(tls_sni) as pkts,
  tls_sni as app,
FROM $packets_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
GROUP BY 
  tls_sni

panels.title: TLS SNI Egress

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of egress packets by extracting the hostname from the TLS SNI (Server Name Indication) information. It sends this hostname to Netify to retrieve data about the type of application associated with it. This analysis focuses solely on egress traffic, allowing for a detailed examination of traffic metrics linked to specific application identifiers behind each hostname.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT tls_sni_netify_app_tag as app, ts as time, sum(frame_len) as ' ',
FROM $packets_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
SAMPLE BY ${sample_rate} ALIGN TO CALENDAR
ORDER BY ts ASC

panels.title: Netify Hostname TLS SNI Application Tag Bytes Transferred per Sample Rate ($sample_rate)

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of egress packets by extracting the hostname from the TLS SNI (Server Name Indication) information. It sends this hostname to Netify to retrieve data about the type of application associated with it. This analysis focuses solely on egress traffic, allowing for a detailed examination of traffic metrics linked to specific application identifiers behind each hostname.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT tls_sni_netify_app_tag as app, ip_dst_netify_geo_country as country, ts as time, sum(frame_len) as ' ',
FROM $packets_prefix$table 
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
SAMPLE BY ${sample_rate} ALIGN TO CALENDAR
ORDER BY ts ASC

panels.title: Netify Hostname TLS SNI Application Tag Bytes Transferred per Sample Rate ($sample_rate)

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of egress application tags for Netify IPs. It takes the IP address, sends it to Netify, which performs a reverse DNS lookup to gather information about the application associated with the IP. This analysis focuses specifically on egress traffic, helping to track and understand the types of applications generating outgoing packets.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  count(ip_dst_netify_app_tag) as pkts,
  ip_dst_netify_app_tag as app,
FROM $packets_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
GROUP BY 
  ip_dst_netify_app_tag

panels.title: Netify IP RDNS Application Tag Egress

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of egress packets categorized by Netify IP application tags. It processes the IP addresses, sending them to Netify for reverse DNS lookups, which retrieve information about the application categories associated with each IP. This analysis focuses specifically on egress traffic, providing insights into the types of applications that are being accessed based on their destination categories.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  count(ip_dst_netify_app_category_tag) as pkts,
  ip_dst_netify_app_category_tag as app,
FROM $packets_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
GROUP BY 
  ip_dst_netify_app_category_tag

panels.title: Netify IP RDNS Application Category Tag Egress

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of egress packets by extracting the hostname from the TLS SNI (Server Name Indication) information. It sends this hostname to Netify to retrieve data about the type of application associated with it. This analysis focuses solely on egress traffic, allowing for a detailed examination of traffic metrics linked to specific application identifiers behind each hostname.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  count(tls_sni_netify_app_tag) as pkts,
  tls_sni_netify_app_tag as app,
FROM $packets_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
GROUP BY 
  tls_sni_netify_app_tag

panels.title: Netify Hostname TLS SNI Application Tag Egress

panels.description: This panel visualizes the distribution of egress packets categorized by TLS SNI application tags. It takes the hostname from the TLS SNI, sends it to Netify, and retrieves data about the application category associated with that hostname. This analysis focuses exclusively on egress traffic, helping to identify traffic patterns and application usage based on the categorized information obtained from the hostname.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  count(tls_sni_netify_app_category_tag) as pkts,
  tls_sni_netify_app_category_tag as app,
FROM $packets_prefix$table
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ 'PUBLIC'
GROUP BY 
  tls_sni_netify_app_category_tag

panels.title: Netify Hostname TLS SNI Application Category Tag Egress

targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM packets_${table} 
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ts) AND 
  tls_sni ~ '${SNI:regex}' AND 
  ip_src_type ~ '${ip_scr_type:regex}' AND
  ip_dst_type ~ '${ip_dst_type:regex}'
ORDER BY ts ASC

list.definition:
SELECT replace(table_name, 'packets_', '')
  FROM (
    SHOW TABLES
  ) as tables
WHERE tables.table_name LIKE 'packets_%'
list.label: Experiments
list.name: table
list.query:
SELECT replace(table_name, 'packets_', '')
  FROM (
    SHOW TABLES
  ) as tables
WHERE tables.table_name LIKE 'packets_%'

list.description: The rate by which the data should be sampled
list.label: Sample Rate
list.name: sample_rate

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT  tls_sni FROM packets_$table WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND tls_sni != ''
list.label: SNI
list.name: SNI
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT  tls_sni FROM packets_$table WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND tls_sni != ''

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ip_src_type FROM packets_$table WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND tls_sni != ''

list.name: ip_scr_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ip_src_type FROM packets_$table WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND tls_sni != ''

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ip_dst_type FROM packets_$table WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND tls_sni != ''

list.name: ip_dst_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ip_dst_type FROM packets_$table WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) AND tls_sni != ''
